primCategory.name: globalMatPrim
primCategory.overview: Materials not specific to a single subsystem.
primCategory.prim: Wall material
Need vacuum for some 'solids'

primCategory.name: globalCountPrim
primCategory.overview: Counts of objects more inclusive than a single subsystem; also other integer constants used in identifiers.
primCategory.prim: Number of towers in x.
Number of towers in y.
Id field value for CAL (within towers)
Id field value for TKR (within towers)
Id field value for LAT
Id field value for solar panels
Id field value for spacecraft
id field for towers (within LAT)
id field for ACD (within LAT)

primCategory.name: globalDimPrim
primCategory.overview: Fundamental dimensions and offsets for objects not associated with any single subsystem.
primCategory.prim: Width of a single CAL-TKR module. THIS IS TOO BIG -- NEED NEW CAL NUMBERS
Spacing between tracker and calorimeter
gap between modules
Wall thickness
width of tower, including walls.
Distance between centers of towers (X or Y)

primCategory.name: CALMatPrim
primCategory.prim: Crystal Material
Diode Material
Wrap material for CsI logs
Material for CAL frame
Material for space between CAL layers
Material for CAL grid
Material for CAL flange

primCategory.name: CALCountPrim
primCategory.overview: Counts for replicated objects in the Calorimeter; other integer constants used to keep track of identifiers.
primCategory.prim: Number of layers of CAL CsI crystals
Number of crystals per layer within a tower
idField value for CAL log field (the CsI crystal)
idField value for CAL log field (a diode)
idField value for diode field (minus, small)
idField value for diode field (plus, small)
idField value for diode field (minus, large)
idField value for diode field (plus, large)

primCategory.name: CALDimPrim
primCategory.overview: Fundamental dimensions of solids and offsets for the Calorimeter
primCategory.prim: Thickness of diodes
Width of diodes
Height of large diode
Height of a small diode
Length of a CsI crystal. Too big??
(Transverse) width of a CsI crytal
Height of a CsI crystal
Y (transverse) offset of diode relative to crystal
Z offset of large diode relative to crystal
Z offset of small diode relative to crystal
Transverse distance between logs
Gap between CAL layers
Thickness of CAL frame sides
Thickness of top and bottom of CAL frame
Thickness of CAL grid between towers
Thickness of CAL grid on outside towers
** Need meaningful comment here**

primCategory.name: TKRMatPrim
primCategory.overview: Materials used in the TKR description
primCategory.prim: material used in tracker conversion
Material of tracker detector elements
material used in tracker tray core
Material of tracker face sheet

primCategory.name: TKRCountPrim
primCategory.overview: Counts of objects and other quantities used to form identifiers within the tracker.
primCategory.prim: Number of strips per wafer
Wafers for a layer within a tower form a square array of this dimension
number of trays (one more than number of x-y planes)
number of trays with no converter. These trays have the lowest tray number
number of trays with super-Glast thickness converter. These are immediately above the no-lead trays
Number of front-end readout strips per die (determines number of Si strips)
Field value for Si field (bottom of tray)
Field value for Si field (top of tray)

primCategory.name: TKRDimPrim
primCategory.overview: Fundamental solid dimensions and offsets within the Tracker.
primCategory.prim: Si thickness
Thickness of core material in all trays except the bottom
Core thickness for bottom tray
Thickness of glue between Si and bias plane
Thickness of glue between non-Si components
Thickness of conversion material in "regular" layers in mm
Thickness of conversion material in super-GLAST layers in mm
Face sheet thickness for all but super-glast layers
Face sheet thickness for super-glast layers
Thickness of bias plane
Gap between top of one tray and bottom of the tray above
Height of a tracker tower
gap between Si dies (superseded/obsolete?)
Length and width of Si wafer
Length and width of active area on a wafer
**Is this just a replacement for wallWidth?
X and y width of face sheet
**Insert comment here**
gap between ladders
Center-to-center distance between trays. Obsolete. Now gap between trays is constant
Thickness of converter + core?? Probably obsolete
guard ring size. Probably irrelevant.

primCategory.name: ACDMatPrim
primCategory.overview: Materials used in the ACD description
primCategory.prim: material used for tiles
Material of ACD support. Still need input from engineers about this.
Material for scintillating tape

primCategory.name: ACDCountPrim
primCategory.overview: Counts of objects and other quantities used to form identifiers within the ACD.
primCategory.prim: Number of tiles across top in x direction
Number of tiles across top in y direction
Number of gaps (long axis = Z) to be covered by scintillating tape on each side o the ACD. Should this be derived from #tiles in some side row?
Number of rows of tiles along the sides
Number of tiles in some (currently upper two) side rows
Number of tiles in some (currently lower two) side rows
Top of ACD
Neg. x face
Neg. y face
Pos. x face
Pos. y face

primCategory.name: ACDDimPrim
primCategory.overview: Fundamental solid dimensions and offsets within the ACD.
primCategory.prim: Thickness of ACD tiles
This is just a figment of my imagination. I have no real number yet.
This one is right if side_standoff is another name for side_tile_standoff, the distance between the side of the tracker and the ACD tiles
This is the total amount of space available to top section of the ACD, includes tiles and support structure (Heather).
Worst-case (most thermal expansion) gap between tiles on the top
distance between ACD top and top of TKR
Width of overlap of overlapped top tiles
Total amount of space available for side section of ACD, including both tiles and support structure
Height of top row of side tiles
Height of 2nd row of side tiles
Height of 3rd row of side tiles
Height of 4th row of side tiles
Distance side tiles extend above topACD tile surface --- used for positioning
Vertical gap between (rows of?) side tiles
Horizontal gap at the corners between adjacent sides of tiles
Thickness of scintillating tape
Width of scintillating tape
Distance tape should extend beyond the end of a top tile (see Heather's first diagram)
Distance between the tape and the adjacent ACD tile

derCategory.name: derACD
derCategory.overview: Derived constants specific to the ACD

derCategory.name: derGlobal
derCategory.overview: A few more constants needed for the outermost LAT composition
